Class LibraryImp

java.lang.Object
LibraryImp
All Implemented Interfaces:
Library
public final class LibraryImp extends Object implements Library
This class implements the interface Library of the A03 Project Example, representing the management of a library
. We make the class final, to avoid any further class specialising it more.

      Specified by:
      removeUser in interface Library
      Parameters:
      _userID - - The id of the user.
      Returns:

      imposeUserFine in interface Library

      Returns:
